svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-09-13T16:29:43.901Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:102.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/102.0" etag="vIZqG6Pt1VWDLM9uwty8" version="21.7.2" type="github"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="qz0gsNkS-N83Ydrr4z1u"> <mxGraphModel dx="4245" dy="2720" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-6" value="<b><font style="font-size: 18px;">EmS</font></b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1440" y="-960" width="160" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-7" value="<b><font style="font-size: 18px;">ExS</font></b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1440" y="-720" width="160" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-8" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">EEx<br></font></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1440" y="-480" width="160" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-9" value="<b><font style="font-size: 18px;">IEx</font></b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1440" y="-240" width="160" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-10" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" source="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-6" target="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-7" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1400" y="-820" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1350" y="-870" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-13" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" source="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-8" target="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-9" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1490" y="-900" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1490" y="-860" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-14" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" source="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-7" target="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-8" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1480" y="-890" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1480" y="-850" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-15" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" source="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-6" target="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-16" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1280" y="-1040" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1200" y="-1040" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-16" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">EmSD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(A</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,A<sub>na</sub>) </font><font style="font-size: 18px;">/ (Ad<sub>1</sub>, ..., </font><font style="font-size: 18px;">Ad<sub>na</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-960" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-17" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" target="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-18" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1360" y="-800" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1200" y="-860" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-18" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">FD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(B</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,B<sub>nb</sub>)&nbsp; / (Bd<sub>1</sub>, ..., B</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">d<sub>nb</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-840" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-21" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1520" y="-800.13" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1360" y="-800.13" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-23" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">ExSD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(C</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,C<sub>nc</sub>)</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"> / (Cd<sub>1</sub>, ..., C</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">d<sub>nc</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-720" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-24" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1280" y="-680.56" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1200" y="-680.56" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-27" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1520" y="-560" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1360" y="-560" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-28" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1360" y="-560.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1200" y="-560.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-29" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">ExD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(D</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,D<sub>nd</sub>)&nbsp; / (Dd<sub>1</sub>, ..., D</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">d<sub>nd</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-600" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-30" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">EExD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(E</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,E<sub>ne</sub>)&nbsp; / (Ed<sub>1</sub>, ..., E</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">d<sub>ne</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-480" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-31" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1280" y="-440" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1200" y="-440.66999999999996" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-32" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">CiD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(F</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,F<sub>nf</sub>)&nbsp; / (Fd<sub>1</sub>, ..., F</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">d<sub>nf</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-360" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-33" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" target="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1360" y="-320" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1210" y="-321" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-36" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">CiM</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">Mf<sub>1</sub>,...</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">,Mf<sub>nf'</sub></font><font style="font-size: 18px;"> <br></font></div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1750" y="-360" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-37" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">FM</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">Mb<sub>1</sub>,...</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">,Mb<sub>nb'</sub></font><font style="font-size: 18px;"> <br></font></div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1750" y="-840" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-38" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">ExM</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">Md<sub>1</sub>,...</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">,Md<sub>nd'</sub></font><font style="font-size: 18px;"> <br></font></div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1750" y="-600" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-39" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1520" y="-320.62" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1360" y="-320.62" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-40" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-1280" y="-199.95999999999998" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-1200" y="-200.62999999999994" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-41" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 18px;">HBMD</font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 18px;">(G</font><font style="font-size: 18px;"><sub>1</sub>,...,G<sub>ng</sub>)&nbsp; / (Gd<sub>1</sub>, ..., G</font><font style="font-size: 18px;">d<sub>ng</sub>, X<sub>1</sub>,...) <br></font></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1200" y="-240" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-43" value="<div align="center"><b><font style="font-size: 24px;">Étape 2. Choix population(s) modélisée(s)</font></b></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><blockquote><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Toute population est décrit par :</font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">1/ des individus élémentaires, caractérisés par certaines des variables du modèle:<br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Ω<sub>i</sub> = ((x<sub>1</sub>,...,x<sub>n</sub>))<sub>pi</sub><br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">2/ des fréquences f<sub>j</sub> de chaque individu dans la population </font><font style="font-size: 24px;">Ω<sub>i</sub></font></div></blockquote>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2410" y="-1000" width="560" height="360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-44" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 24px;">Étape 3. Collecte de l'existant <br></font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">En terme de variables X, en fonction des populations choisies</font><b><font style="font-size: 24px;"> </font></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2350" y="-560" width="450" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-45" value="<b><font style="font-size: 24px;">Etape 1. Choix d'une substance </font></b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2350" y="-1140" width="450" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-46" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 24px;">Étape 4. Association de valeurs aux individus</font></b><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Pour une population </font><font style="font-size: 24px;">Ω<sub>i</sub></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>Pour l'individu élémentaire j<br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	1/ F &gt; C </span>&gt; B si B n'existe pas, prendre C, sinon prendre F, sinons NULL.<br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>2/ A -&gt; B -&gt; C -&gt; D -&gt; E -&gt; F -&gt; G, donner une valeur ponctuelle ou tirage aléatoire, à la variable en veillant à la corrélations (reflétées dans le modèle) avec toutes variables, sachant celles caractérisant l'individu (ie stratifier si possible).<br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Répéter<br></font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2420" y="-320" width="580" height="400" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-69" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 24px;">Étape 5. Résultats</font></b></div><div><b><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></b></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">1/<b> </b>Risque?</font></div><div align="left"><font style="font-size: 24px;">2/ % Voies à IEx<br></font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2420" y="170" width="580" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MPuNsn4p5TTOdcd58fuY-70" value="<div><b><font style="font-size: 24px;">Principes directeurs</font></b></div><div><b><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></b></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">1/ Il faut utiliser les modèles les plus réalistes possibles.<br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">2/ Prendre des P95 pour chaque variable, dans un esprit 'approche de tier 1', n'a pas de sens, car cela néglige les corrélations entre variables et about à des expositions non-réalistes. <br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;"><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 24px;">2/ Même si pas de risque, intéressant de connaître contribution des voies au RCR.<br></font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1630" y="-20" width="580" height="400" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.font: 1/ des individus élémentaires, caractérisés par certaines des variables du modèle:
2/ des fréquences fj de chaque individu dans la population

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 448px; height: 1px; padding-top: 655px; margin-left: 71px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.font: En terme de variables X, en fonction des populations choisies

b.font: Étape 4. Association de valeurs aux individus

div.font: 1/ F > C > B si B n'existe pas, prendre C, sinon prendre F, sinons NULL.

2/ A -> B -> C -> D -> E -> F -> G, donner une valeur ponctuelle ou tirage aléatoire, à la variable en veillant à la corrélations (reflétées dans le modèle) avec toutes variables, sachant celles caractérisant l'individu (ie stratifier si possible).

switch.text: Étape 4. Association de valeurs aux individus...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 578px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1385px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 578px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1320px; margin-left: 791px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1/ Il faut utiliser les modèles les plus réalistes possibles.
2/ Prendre des P95 pour chaque variable, dans un esprit 'approche de tier 1', n'a pas de sens, car cela néglige les corrélations entre variables et about à des expositions non-réalistes.
2/ Même si pas de risque, intéressant de connaître contribution des voies au RCR.
